title: Negative "reward" Icons.
body: So I saw the blog post about player feedback and thought it would be a great idea for Riot to enforce an Icon of Negativity on the profiles of toxic, shitty players so that other people can more readily dodge or afk while doing something useful like, I dunno, making a sandwich or something knowing that their time is better spent elsewhere than attempting to co-operate with degenerates, being forced to play this game with those of the cesspit variety.

replies.body: Or just ban them in general, going afk would make us hypocrites. XD
was just thinking, in my opinion, the type of language used to describe the people who are "toxic, shitty players" probably talk rather similar to the way this person does.. hmm
